title: Old and New
description: Special project under development that will featured content about YouTube in the past and present

videos.title: Deeps Stuff Project Re-Brief
videos.description: Learn about Project Re-Brief, the groundbreaking Google experiment that re-invented four iconic advertising campaigns: Coca-Cola’s “Hilltop”, Volvo’s “Drive It Like You Hate It”, Alka-Seltzer’s “I Can’t Believe I Ate the Whole Thing”, and Avis’ “We Try Harder”.  The experiment not only re-imagined advertising in today’s digital world but also pushed the boundaries of creative and technological collaboration. [2:14]
